original_text: If you are patient, you may make a ruler change his mind. If you speak a quiet word, you can remove a difficult problem.
korean_text: 오래 참으면 관원도 설득할 수 있나니 부드러운 혀는 뼈를 꺾느니라

sentences.original_text: you may make a ruler change his mind
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 통치자의 마음을 바꾸게 할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: If you speak a quiet word
you can remove a difficult problem
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 어려운 문제를 제거할 수 있습니다
